snippet: Congregations that have eliminated mandatory dues have reported growth in both members and revenues, even as many other synagogues are declining on both fronts.
abstract: UJA-Federation of New York releases first comprehensive study of small but growing trend of synagogues that have switched from charging mandatory annual dues to voluntary pledge system; around 30 synagogues across the United States have adopted voluntary system, which seeks to address questions about mandatory system's sustainability.
lead_paragraph: Congregations that have eliminated mandatory dues have reported growth in both members and revenues, even as many other synagogues are declining on both fronts.

headline.main: The ‘Pay What You Want’ Experiment at Synagogues
headline.print_headline: The ‘Pay What You Want’ Experiment at Synagogues
